title: Abstract Wiki Frame: Relational role / position / office

frame_type.description: Canonical frame identifier for the role / position / office family.

holder.description: Entity holding the role or office (typically a person). Shape follows semantics.types.Entity.

title_lemma.description: Lemma-level label for the role, position, or office, e.g. 'prime minister', 'president', 'professor of physics'.

organization.description: Organization, institution, or body associated with the role (e.g. a government, university, or club). Shape follows semantics.types.Entity.

jurisdiction.description: Jurisdiction or territorial unit over which the office has authority (e.g. country, region, department). Shape follows semantics.types.Entity.

start.description: Time span for the start of the term in office. Shape follows semantics.types.TimeSpan.

end.description: Time span for the end of the term in office, if applicable. Shape follows semantics.types.TimeSpan.

predecessor.description: Entity representing the predecessor in this role or office, if known.

successor.description: Entity representing the successor in this role or office, if known.

acting.description: Whether the role holder is/was serving in an acting or interim capacity.

status.description: Optional status label for the role-holding, such as 'current', 'former', 'designate'.

certainty.description: Optional certainty / confidence score for this role relation. Numeric scores should be between 0 and 1.

source_id.description: Optional identifier for the source record from which this role relation was derived.

attributes.description: Free-form attribute bag for additional, lightly structured information not yet promoted to first-class fields (e.g. method of appointment, portfolio details).

extra.description: Reserved for pipeline- or source-specific metadata that should not affect generation but may be useful for debugging or analysis.

office_lemma.description: Legacy field: office title lemma. Prefer 'title_lemma' for new data.

office_holder.description: Legacy field: office holder entity. Prefer 'holder' for new data.

body.description: Legacy field: body or organization associated with the office. Prefer 'organization' and/or 'jurisdiction' for new data.

start_time.description: Legacy field: term start time. Prefer 'start' (TimeSpan).

end_time.description: Legacy field: term end time. Prefer 'end' (TimeSpan).
